content: व्यवसायः {@--1@} Effort, exertion, energy, industry, perseverance; करोतु नाम नीतिज्ञो व्यवसायमितस्ततः <ls>H. 2. 14.</ls> {@--2@} Resolve, resolution, determination; मंदीचकार मरणव्यवसायबुद्धिं <ls>Ku. 4. 45</ls> ‘the thought of resolving to die’; <ls>Bg. 2. 41</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">10. 36.</ls> {@--3@} An act, action, performance; व्यवसायः प्रतिपत्तिनिष्टुरः <ls>R. 8. 65.</ls> {@--4@} ({%a%}) Business, employment, trade. ({%b%}) Following a particular profession or trade. {@--5@} Conduct, behaviour. {@--6@} Device, stratagem, artifice. {@--7@} Boasting. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--9@} Of Śiva.
